name: CARDungeon
description:
CARDungeon comes from two words, Card and Dungeon. You, a Magician who wakes up in an unfamiliar-looking Castle. You don't know what is this place, you don't remember why you are here, nor you remember how you got here. But one last thing for sure, your instinct said that you have to get out.

A game that exists for submission to Indigo Game Startup Incubation Game Jam 2021.

Credit for Music to:

Be Careful - Suspense by JP Soundworks

El Rey by Ean Grimm

Card Deal 20 by Jarno Salo

Card Slide 07 by Jarno Salo

Menu Soundtrack by cactusdude

Member of "Geming" Team: 

Muhammad Haikal Fisabilillah - Game Designer, Leader

Brilian Ade Putra - Game Programmer

Muhammad Rafif Al Aziz - Game Programmer

Amanda Vania Audrey - Game Artist

Audrey Ardelia - Game Artist
